Deficiency Narrative: During the investigation, it was found that a child in care was pushed by a staff member. Video footage of the incident was reviewed and showed a staff member pushing a child in care.
Correction Narrative: An unannounced inspection was completed. The staff stated they were retrained in EBI. The training records were reviewed and staff was trained in EBI the angry child and positive behaviors/understanding emotions.

Deficiency Narrative: One employee inappropriately restrained a child in care at an operation with a no restraint policy
Correction Narrative: Interviews were completed and staff stated the Administrator went over policy again with them and are a no restraint operation.

Deficiency Narrative: A child in care was picked up by the shirt collar by an employee from a sitting position.
Correction Narrative: Interviews were completed and staff stated the Administrator went over policy again with them and are a no restraint operation.

Deficiency Narrative: Two employees restrained a child in care at an operation with a no restraint policy
Correction Narrative: The administrator emailed documentation of two employees,  who did a prohibited restraint/went against the operations policies, termination. The operation retrained staff on all discipline and behavior management policies on 11/7/23.
